memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, const QList< QgsMapLayer *> &layerList=QList< QgsMapLayer *>(), IdentifyMode mode=DefaultQgsSetting)
memberdef.name: identify

briefdescription.para: Performs the identification.

parameterdescription.para: Performs the identification within the given list of layers. Default value is an empty list, i.e. uses all the layers.
Identification mode. Can use Qgis default settings or a defined mode. Default mode is DefaultQgsSetting.

memberdef.argsstring: (int x, int y, IdentifyMode mode, LayerType layerType=AllLayers)
memberdef.name: identify

briefdescription.para: Performs the identification.

detaileddescription.para:
To avoid being forced to specify IdentifyMode with a list of layers this has been made private and two publics methods are offered
x
x coordinates of mouseEvent
y
y coordinates of mouseEvent
mode
Identification mode. Can use Qgis default settings or a defined mode.
layerType
Only performs identification in a certain type of layers (raster, vector). Default value is AllLayers.
a list of IdentifyResult

briefdescription.para: Performs identification based on a geometry (in map coordinates)

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsGeometry &geometry, IdentifyMode mode, const QList< QgsMapLayer *> &layerList, LayerType layerType)
memberdef.name: identify

briefdescription.para: Performs identification based on a geometry (in map coordinates)
Returns a pointer to the identify menu which will be used in layer selection mode this menu can also be customized.
Returns derived attributes map for a clicked point in map coordinates. May be 2D or 3D point.

briefdescription.para: Call the right method depending on layer type.

memberdef.name: identifyRasterLayer

briefdescription.para: Clears canvas properties overrides previously set with setCanvasPropertiesOverrides()
Overrides some map canvas properties inside the map tool for the upcoming identify requests.

detaileddescription.para: This is useful when the identification is triggered by some other piece of GUI like a 3D map view and some properties like search radius need to be adjusted so that identification returns correct results. Currently only search radius may be overridden.

When the custom identification has finished, restoreCanvasPropertiesOverrides() should be called to erase any overrides.
restoreCanvasPropertiesOverrides()
QGIS 3.4

memberdef.argsstring: (const QgsAbstractGeometry &geometry, const QgsPointXY &layerPoint, QMap< QString, QString > &derivedAttributes)
